As an AI language model, I do not have personal opinions, but both horizontal and vertical analysis are useful in identifying areas of improvement for a company. Horizontal analysis is valuable in identifying trends and changes over time, such as revenue growth or cost reduction. By analyzing financial statements of multiple periods, horizontal analysis helps in understanding the long-term performance of the company. 

Vertical analysis helps identify stronger and weaker areas within a single period's financial statements. By examining the relationship between different elements of the financial statement, it enables analysts to identify areas for improvement, such as those generating less revenue compared to their costs or those that consume a significant portion of the company's assets. 

To assess the financial performance of a company thoroughly, both horizontal and vertical analysis methods can be used together, where horizontal analysis is used to track changes in financial performance over time, and vertical analysis is used to understand the relationship of different elements within the same period.
